R.content: [re: democratic count] how many voices, how many votes for the unconscious?
R.linkedContent: [re: democratic count] how many voices, how many votes for the unconscious?

R.content: the unconscious remains the most vital reserve of the self-destructive conservation of the “subject” or of egological ipseity; without autoimmunity, no sadism, masochism, consciousness, death drive
R.linkedContent: the unconscious remains the most vital reserve of the self-destructive conservation of the “subject” or of egological ipseity; without autoimmunity, no sadism, masochism, consciousness, death drive

R.content: autoimmunity takes account of what psychoanalysis once called the unconscious
R.linkedContent: autoimmunity takes account of what psychoanalysis once called the unconscious

LOBL.content: the must not or need not know yourself, the interdiction of each event, interposes an unconscious between the event and the experience of it, between living-on and presence
LOBL.linkedContent: the must not or need not know yourself, the interdiction of each event, interposes an unconscious between the event and the experience of it, between living-on and presence

HERP.content: can we read an “unconscious” affinity btwn impending arrival of friend and imminence of death? [Heidegger would protest—isn’t analytic of Dasein regulated by norms of absolute intentional meaning?]
HERP.linkedContent: can we read an “unconscious” affinity btwn impending arrival of friend and imminence of death? [Heidegger would protest—isn’t analytic of Dasein regulated by norms of absolute intentional meaning?]

VP.content: Husserl and Freud both view unconscious as “after-the-fact,” Freud’s Nachträglichkeit (après-coup), though Husserl utterly rejects its possibility
VP.linkedContent: Husserl and Freud both view unconscious as “after-the-fact,” Freud’s Nachträglichkeit (après-coup), though Husserl utterly rejects its possibility

FSW.content: for Freud, wrong to think simple translation can occur from unconscious to conscious, presupposes immobile master text > unconscious consists of archives always already transcriptions
FSW.linkedContent: for Freud, wrong to think simple translation can occur from unconscious to conscious, presupposes immobile master text > unconscious consists of archives always already transcriptions

FSW.content: Freud’s supplementarity: unconscious not a code book
FSW.linkedContent: Freud’s supplementarity: unconscious not a code book

F.content: question of crypt (singular not general) precedes philosophical questions re: Thing, Thinking > false, “artificial” unconscious (new metaphorical terrain): graft in heart of the organ
F.linkedContent: question of crypt (singular not general) precedes philosophical questions re: Thing, Thinking > false, “artificial” unconscious (new metaphorical terrain): graft in heart of the organ

F.content: crypt (foreigner in self) & the ghost effect (heterocryptic ghost returning from Unconscious of the other) > radical otherness in self (not unconscious) > law of another generation
F.linkedContent: crypt (foreigner in self) & the ghost effect (heterocryptic ghost returning from Unconscious of the other) > radical otherness in self (not unconscious) > law of another generation

FWT.content: “subject” instituted only out of “fear” of unconscious, interrupts energy; one ethical/political “system,” one “idea” of Good/Right > constructions produced to resist a threat
FWT.linkedContent: “subject” instituted only out of “fear” of unconscious, interrupts energy; one ethical/political “system,” one “idea” of Good/Right > constructions produced to resist a threat

POOF.content: a passive decision, responsibility outside of knowledge, outside of subjective decisionism, occurs from the heartbeat of the other (blood arriving), which makes an exception for/of me > opens autonomy on to itself, matches decision to the gift, figure of the heartbeat: [passive decision doesn’t contradict sovereign decision, sovereign becomes guest, other?]
POOF.linkedContent: a passive decision, responsibility outside of knowledge, outside of subjective decisionism, occurs from the heartbeat of the other (blood arriving), which makes an exception for/of me > opens autonomy on to itself, matches decision to the gift, figure of the heartbeat: [passive decision doesn’t contradict sovereign decision, sovereign becomes guest, other?]

POOF.content: friendship–enemy btwn logic of unconscious & logic of lie: these 2 logics can’t help but haunt each other, et de partager même le concept de cette hantise qui travaille le langage de notres temps
POOF.linkedContent: friendship–enemy btwn logic of unconscious & logic of lie: these 2 logics can’t help but haunt each other, et de partager même le concept de cette hantise qui travaille le langage de notres temps

DS.content: hymen is like Freud’s unconscious (tolerates or remains insensitive to contradiction)
DS.linkedContent: hymen is like Freud’s unconscious (tolerates or remains insensitive to contradiction)

POS.content: “undecidable” not Hegelian contradiction, but, in rigorously Freudian sense, the unconscious of philosophical contradiction, which ignores contradiction, to extent that it belongs to speech, consciousness, discourse, presence, truth
POS.linkedContent: “undecidable” not Hegelian contradiction, but, in rigorously Freudian sense, the unconscious of philosophical contradiction, which ignores contradiction, to extent that it belongs to speech, consciousness, discourse, presence, truth

DIF.content: via differance, unconscious not a virtual, hidden, potential self-presence but differs, and defers, itself
DIF.linkedContent: via differance, unconscious not a virtual, hidden, potential self-presence but differs, and defers, itself

SW.content: unconscious never disarms—more powerful than “technical all-powerfulness”: resists translation
SW.linkedContent: unconscious never disarms—more powerful than “technical all-powerfulness”: resists translation

DPi.content: Baudelaire & Nietzsche (less narrowly) confine interest to zoo-psychobiology (conscious or unconscious motivations of the individual) > “we must” think interest in relation to that of the (global) state’s interest in maintaining/suspending DP
DPi.linkedContent: Baudelaire & Nietzsche (less narrowly) confine interest to zoo-psychobiology (conscious or unconscious motivations of the individual) > “we must” think interest in relation to that of the (global) state’s interest in maintaining/suspending DP

DPi.content: impossible to know if what we blithely call unconscious can calculate incalculable
DPi.linkedContent: impossible to know if what we blithely call unconscious can calculate incalculable

REST.content: putting shoes on acc. its own size (sa pointure)? unconscious of Shapiro/Heidegger puts something of his own (sien) in them? > no, à la pointure du fantôme (the ghost’s size), of the unconscious of the other, in the final account (tout compte fait)
REST.linkedContent: putting shoes on acc. its own size (sa pointure)? unconscious of Shapiro/Heidegger puts something of his own (sien) in them? > no, à la pointure du fantôme (the ghost’s size), of the unconscious of the other, in the final account (tout compte fait)

DST.content: ne pas ne pas: redoubles movement of negation through syntactical formation
DST.linkedContent: ne pas ne pas: redoubles movement of negation through syntactical formation

DST.content: not do something that consists in not doing: ineluctable, unavoidable
DST.linkedContent: not do something that consists in not doing: ineluctable, unavoidable

DST.content: neither work of dialectic or unconscious denegation [neither Freud nor Hegel]
DST.linkedContent: neither work of dialectic or unconscious denegation [neither Freud nor Hegel]

LI.content: [from SEC] structural unconsciousness, absence of intending actual utterance, prohibits any saturation of context (total presence)
LI.linkedContent: [from SEC] structural unconsciousness, absence of intending actual utterance, prohibits any saturation of context (total presence)

LI.content: unconscious as giant/great Parasite > not as lateral, virtual potential of consciousness
LI.linkedContent: unconscious as giant/great Parasite > not as lateral, virtual potential of consciousness

LI.content: economics that accounts for iterability, which questions traditional philosophy of oikos, of propre—can’t be separate from economy of Unconscious, of graphematics of undecidables
LI.linkedContent: economics that accounts for iterability, which questions traditional philosophy of oikos, of propre—can’t be separate from economy of Unconscious, of graphematics of undecidables

AD.content: that decision & responsibility are always of the other, the making unconscious of the Schmittian sovereign decision (cf. POOF 68-9), not how Levinas would put it
AD.linkedContent: that decision & responsibility are always of the other, the making unconscious of the Schmittian sovereign decision (cf. POOF 68-9), not how Levinas would put it

BSi.content: force-differential (unconscious mechanisms) btwn which tension/contradiction bound to localize > bêtise on both sides: side of sovereign (who), side of beast, the stupid, the other (what)
BSi.linkedContent: force-differential (unconscious mechanisms) btwn which tension/contradiction bound to localize > bêtise on both sides: side of sovereign (who), side of beast, the stupid, the other (what)

OG.content: passivity of speech can’t be distinguished from relation btwn unconsciousness of language and spacing (pause, blank, punctuation, interval) that constitutes origin of signification in general
OG.linkedContent: passivity of speech can’t be distinguished from relation btwn unconsciousness of language and spacing (pause, blank, punctuation, interval) that constitutes origin of signification in general

OG.content: spacing as writing is the becoming-absent, becoming-unconscious of the subject
OG.linkedContent: spacing as writing is the becoming-absent, becoming-unconscious of the subject

CIR.content: G. and I are whispering, confess w/out anyone knowing, like a gift confession from the unconscious (know of no other definition of unconscious)
CIR.linkedContent: G. and I are whispering, confess w/out anyone knowing, like a gift confession from the unconscious (know of no other definition of unconscious)

SPEC.content: Nietzsche dared to link debt to the unconscious, a debt to that which one feels in advance acquitted, the debt of another that comes back to torment you
SPEC.linkedContent: Nietzsche dared to link debt to the unconscious, a debt to that which one feels in advance acquitted, the debt of another that comes back to torment you

WBH.content: if gift has assignable destination, is an exchange, it’s not a gift, if there is from man to woman (or woman to man) an assignable destination (re: object, discourse, jouissance, desire, subject), no longer a gift > gift must be absolutely unconscious & random to be given a chance
WBH.linkedContent: if gift has assignable destination, is an exchange, it’s not a gift, if there is from man to woman (or woman to man) an assignable destination (re: object, discourse, jouissance, desire, subject), no longer a gift > gift must be absolutely unconscious & random to be given a chance
